content.rendered:
We’re glad to announced that AI tech and chatbot developer Stanfy has joined the Intellectsoft family. Furthermore, our company has started an internal audit and is preparing to go public in 2020.

Since it’s establishment in 2005, Stanfy has accumulated a vast experience in creating software for wearable tech and robust solutions for self-learning chatbots. Our teams will extend its partnerships within the chatbot community to provide the best possible integrations of chatbot solutions for our clients.

“We’ve embarked on some big journeys as a team, but we can’t wait to see what will happen when we take on projects of a much larger scale,” said Alexandr Tyschenko, CTO of Stanfy. “Being part of a much larger team is an exciting prospect for everyone at Stanfy.”

“Stanfy is like a family of geniuses, where everybody brings something unique to the table, which results in very exciting ideas and flawless development and execution,” said our Co-Founder and Chief Strategy Officer, Artem Kozel. “Our future work will rely heavily on their AI, chatbot, and IoT expertise. With our growing expertise in blockchain technology we can’t wait to see how their approach will improve our company and what new opportunities it will bring to our clients.”
